attributes.action: Put speed humps in along albemarle Rd newcastle st5
attributes.background: Idiotic people uses the road as a rat race there is a lot of children who live in the street who are always out and about playing who surely are either going to be seriously injured or killed. Make our street safe to protect our children and pets before its to late

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
